verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w mighty|strong="G2478"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, clothed \w with|strong="G4016"\w* a \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w rainbow|strong="G2463"\w* \add was\add* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* his \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \add was\add* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w pillars|strong="G4769"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* a little \w book|strong="G0974"\w* \w open|strong="G0455"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w set|strong="G5087"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w foot|strong="G4228"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \add his\add* \w left|strong="G2176"\w* \add foot\add* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \add when\add* a \w lion|strong="G3023"\w* \w roareth|strong="G3455"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w thunders|strong="G1027"\w* \w uttered|strong="G2980"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w thunders|strong="G1027"\w* had \w uttered|strong="G2980"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, I was \w about|strong="G3195"\w* to \w write|strong="G1125"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, Seal \w up|strong="G4972"\w* those things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w thunders|strong="G1027"\w* \w uttered|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w them|strong="G5023"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* lifted \w up|strong="G0142"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w sware|strong="G3660"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* him that \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the things \w that|strong="G3588"\w* therein \w are|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the things \w that|strong="G3588"\w* therein \w are|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* there should \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w longer|strong="G2089"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* he shall \w begin|strong="G3195"\w* to \w sound|strong="G4537"\w*, the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* should be \w finished|strong="G5055"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* he hath \w declared|strong="G2097"\w* to \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Go|strong="G5217"\w* \add and\add* \w take|strong="G2983"\w* the little \w book|strong="G0974"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w standeth|strong="G2476"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Give|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* the little \w book|strong="G0974"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Take|strong="G2983"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2719"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G2719"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it shall \w make|strong="G4087"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* belly \w bitter|strong="G2836"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* it shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w sweet|strong="G1099"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w honey|strong="G3192"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the little \w book|strong="G0974"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w angelâ€™s|strong="G0032"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ate|strong="G2719"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G2719"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w sweet|strong="G1099"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w honey|strong="G3192"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as soon \w as|strong="G3753"\w* I had \w eaten|strong="G5315"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w belly|strong="G2836"\w* was \w bitter|strong="G4087"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4571"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w peoples|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*.
